messages.error: ValueError: Channel External not found in the channels list

content.content:
To add Charlie to the channel, first find the exact name of the channel starting with "External". Once you have it, use:

```
add_user_to_channel(user='Charlie', channel='<channel_name>')
```

Replace `<channel_name>` with the actual name of the channel.
